DOC.brief_summary: A Phase 2 , Randomized , Double-masked , Placebo-controlled Multicenter Clinical Trial Designed Evaluate Safety Efficacy Luminate Inducing PVD Subjects Non-Proliferative Diabetic Retinopathy .

Subjects free significant retinal pathology could interfere measurement conduct study 5 . Intraocular Pressure control , IOP 30 mm less 6 . Male female subject 7 . Signed Informed Consent 1 . Subjects history retinal detachment study eye 9 . High myope spherical equivalent > 8.00 D spectacle correction study eye 10 . Subjects systolic BP > 180 screen 11 . Subjects HgA1c > 12.0 within 90 day precede enrollment 12 . Subjects chronic recurrent uveitis 13 . Subjects ongoing ocular infection inflammation 14 . Subjects uncontrolled glaucoma , ie IOP > 25mm without IOP lower agent 15 . Subjects contraindication study medication 16 . Subjects unable meet extensive postop evaluation regimen 17 .
